title: Feeders
body:
Getting into a game with someone that is only playing intentionally to grief is becoming a common occurance. 
It is even more annoying to have that same person appear in my team the following game with which I dodged but 
now I have to wait 5minutes because I refused to play with someone who is greifing. 
Should I just stop playing? like is being annoyed and frustrated at a video game too far?

*name removed* needs to be banned please. atleast do that for me.

replies.body: I've been reporting this guy all day and still getting into matches with him on my team. Wheres Riot in this?
Riots giving him sloppy head because he isnt doing anything wrong quoting them
Riot doesn't care about players, especially if they're not Challengers or popular streamers/YouTubers. If they ban the troll, then they'd be losing money.
just get a refund on all ur rp and move onto a new game

If people are being banned than riddle me this, have you EVER received a notification that the griefer or intent feeder was banned after reporting? I know 100% that I haven't, ever! The only time I've received notifications is form a person who was verbally abusing others and we all know that side of the system works.

It's also a fact that known accounts botting, scripting, griefing and intent feeding are still be played to this day even after being reported repeatedly. 

If it really takes months upon months for a person to be banned then surely that in itself suggest the system is broken and needs fixing?

It takes time, they have to sort out the tilted people reporting someone for a bad game and those actually inting.

The guy will get banned if he trolls but it's not instant because as far as the system can tell he was just playing poorly and you 4 on his team decided to report him for that rather than him inting. The system isnt broken, it's just slow. People are banned all the time but anyone could randomly get so tilted they feed meaning theres millions of players that could do this at any one time. He might not have been banned that day but 1000 others could have been that you never met and never will meet because of that system.
